alert.note: Alert for La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Saguache County through 600 PM MDT... At 526 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sargents, or 19 miles west of Poncha Pass, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sargents. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft
